context/6: Everybody would wonder what happened to the body.
context/7: He was gonna disappear and leave his wife holding the bag.
context/8: Never got tired of telling me how smart he was.
context/9: Well, the chump was asking for it.

context: No, I'll own it seems unlikely.
context/0: Two men in the same place and at the same time?
context/1: Would you say there were two men, Sergeant, like that?
context/2: You seem so positive we're dealing with just one man.
context/3: The police are potent so long as they are feared.
context/4: This one man with a pair of hands has terrified this whole community and made them realize that the laws are powerful only so long as they are obeyed.
context/5: Men eye each other, even familiar faces, and think, "It might be him. "
context/6: They watch anxiously for their husbands' return from work.
context/7: Women do their shopping before dark and bolt their windows and doors at night.
context/8: The children aren't allowed to play in the streets.
context/9: The people only talk about one subject.
